phrases.added_as_moderator: You were added as moderator into Shooter platform
phrases.click_the_link_below_to_set_password: Click the link below to set password
phrases.if_you_dont_know_this_application_ignore: If you don't know this application, just ignore this message
phrases.we_have_received_a_request_to_reset_your: We've received a request to reset your password in
phrases.if_you_did_not_send_such_a_request_pleas: If you did not send such a request, please ignore it
